00001 #ifndef __ADDITIVEMAP_HH__
00002 #define __ADDITIVEMAP_HH__
00003 
00004 #include <map>
00005 
00006 
00007 template<typename K,typename V>
00008 class AdditiveMap  {
00009   
00010   typedef std::map<K,V> mapType;
00011 
00012   mapType map;
00013 
00014 public :
00015   typedef typename mapType::value_type value_type;
00016   typedef typename mapType::const_iterator const_iterator;
00017   typedef typename mapType::iterator iterator;
00018   AdditiveMap(){};
00019 
00020   // delegate iterator operations to map
00021   const_iterator end() const { return map.end(); }
00022   const_iterator begin() const { return map.begin();}
00023 
00024   iterator find (const K & key) { return map.find(key) ;}
00025 
00026   int addAll (const AdditiveMap<K,V> & other) {
00027     return addAll(other.begin(),other.end());
00028   }
00029 
00030   // adds a set of mappings 
00031   // returns the number of sums computed
00032   int addAll (const_iterator begin,const_iterator end) {
00033     int count = 0;
00034     for ( ; begin != end ; ++ begin ) {
00035       const value_type & val = *begin;
00036       if (add (val.first,val.second) ) 
00037         ++count;
00038     }
00039     return count;
00040   }
00041 
00042   // adds value to the value mapped to key
00043   // returns true if sum was actually used, false if normal insertion performed
00044   bool add (const K & key, const V & value) {
00045     typename mapType::iterator it = map.find(key);
00046     if ( it != map.end() ) {
00047       // found it
00048       it->second = it->second + value ;
00049       return true;
00050     } else {
00051       map.insert(std::make_pair(key,value));
00052       return false;
00053     }
00054   }
00055   // removes value to the value mapped to key
00056   // returns true if difference - was actually used, false if nothing performed
00057   bool remove (const K & key, const V & value) {
00058     typename mapType::iterator it = map.find(key);
00059     if ( it != map.end() ) {
00060       // found it
00061       it->second = it->second - value ;
00062       return true;
00063     } else {
00064       return false;
00065     }
00066   }
00067   
00068 
00069 };
00070 
00071 #endif
